bug.author: madanadit
bug.summary: Ufs read metrics are not updated in k8s
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0-RC4 Describe the bug $ alluxio fsadmin report metrics Total IO: Under Filesystem Read <- this is always zero To Reproduce
deploy alluxio on k8s exec into master pod cat a persisted file with 0% in alluxio storage
ufs read metrics are not updated Expected behavior ufs read io should match the file size Urgency not urgent Additional context not reproducible with on a local machine deployment (no containers or k8s)

comments.comment: The issue should be fixed with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9652>#9652</denchmark-link> .
